oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Progress and paradigms in the search for the neural correlates of consciousness: Editorial introduction to the special issue “The neural correlates of consciousness”
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fink, Sascha Benjamin
Lin, Ying-Tung
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Neural correlates of consciousness
Orientational Paradigms
Scientific Revolutions
Mature Science
Preparadigmatic Science
Neural Correlates of Consciousness
Science of consciousness
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An introduction to the second part of the special issue celebrating the neural correlates of consciousness. Here, we focus on progress and paradigms in the science of consciousness from the perspective of philosophy of science.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Philosophy and the Mind Sciences; Vol. 2 (2021): Philosophy and the Mind Sciences, 2021
